record.field: I agree to the Terms & Conditions stated overleaf and understand that full payment shall be made upon collection of costumes.

TERMS & CONDITIONS
  1. Booking Deposit

    For advance bookings, a booking deposit equivalent to 50% of the rental rate is payable for each set of costume. Upon payment of booking deposit, costume(s) will be set aside for collection date. This deposit is not refundable.

  2. Payment

    All payments are to be made upon collection.

  3. Rental Periods

    Rental period begins on the day of collection and must be returned on or before the date specified on rental agreement (invoice).

    Rental Period Return Price Deposit 1
    7-hour within 7 hrs 50% of 3-day rental fee 300% of rental fee
    1-day before 3pm on following working day 75% of 3-day rental fee 200% of rental fee
    3-day on or before the third day 100% 3-day rental fee 120% of rental fee
    1-week on or before the seventh day 150% of 3-day rental fee 120% of rental fee
  4. Refundable Deposit for Foreigners1

    For foreigners (not holding onto any of the following: Singapore IC/PR IC/Employment/S Pass/Work Permit/Dependent's Pass) a refundable deposit of 300-400% of the costume rental rates would be required, depending on the rental period.

  5. Late Return

    Late return of the costumes would be charged at 100% of 3-day rental fee per 3-day block. Refundable deposit made in cheque would be banked in immediately upon any late return.

  6. Exchange / Cancellation / Refund

    Costumes cannot be changed once costumes have been brought out of the shop premises. Costume changes before collection would be charged at $10 per set. No refund of booking deposit would be made for cancellation of costumes; this includes cancellation due to costumes being ill-fitting, change in event theme, and cancellation of the function or whatsoever reason.

  7. Missing Items, Loss or Damage

    Customers or persons collecting on their behalf should check their items thoroughly during collection and advise the shop of any damage, marks, stains, or missing items. CCM will not be liable for the delivery of any missing items. In the case of loss or damage, the customer may be liable for an extra charge to cover the replacement or repair. This is subjected to severity of the damage and prevailing value of item. Any repairable damage(s) would be charged at reasonable market price not exceeding 50% of the prevailing value of the damaged costume. Irreparable damage(s) and loss of items(s) would be charged to the prevailing value of the item(s).

    Forfeiture
    Late Return 100% of 3-day rental fee per 3-day block
    Repairable Damage Subjected to severity of damage, reasonable market price not exceeding 50% of the prevailing value of the damaged costume
    Irreparable Damage Prevailing value of the item(s).
    Loss
  8. Rental Bags

    Costume and mascot bags should be returned along with the rented items. In the case of failure to return, each carrier, costume cover and mascot bag will be charged $5, $10 and $100 respectively.

  9. Alterations

    Any fitting alterations, if possible, will be done by CCM, prior to collection of items. If customers should make changes to the costumes on their own, they should not do anything that might cause damage to the costume and are required to inform the staff about any alterations made.

  10. Laundry

    Laundering will be done by CCM at no additional cost, except where special laundering is required.

  11. Request for invoice

    Any request to retrieve copies of lost or misplaced invoice will be subjected to a $20 service fee.

  12. Liabilities

    CCM is not responsible for any accident, damage or loss resulting from the use of rental items.

All prices are quoted in Singapore dollars unless otherwise stated.
These terms and conditions are subject to change.
